conditions.name: Common Cold
conditions.suggestion: Rest, stay hydrated, and take over-the-counter medications. Common tablets: Acetaminophen (500mg) for fever/pain, Antihistamines like Cetirizine (10mg) for runny nose, Dextromethorphan (15-30mg) for cough. Use saline nasal drops and throat lozenges for symptom relief.

conditions.name: Influenza (Flu)
conditions.suggestion: Rest, stay hydrated. Common tablets: Oseltamivir (Tamiflu 75mg twice daily) if prescribed within 48 hours, Ibuprofen (400mg) or Acetaminophen (650mg) for fever and body aches. Monitor temperature and seek medical attention if symptoms worsen.

conditions.name: COVID-19
conditions.suggestion: Isolate immediately, contact healthcare provider. Common tablets: Paracetamol (500-1000mg) for fever/pain, prescribed antivirals like Paxlovid if eligible. Monitor oxygen levels, and seek emergency care if experiencing severe symptoms.

conditions.name: Migraine
conditions.suggestion: Rest in a dark, quiet room. Common tablets: Sumatriptan (50-100mg) at onset, Naproxen (500mg) for pain, Anti-nausea tablets like Ondansetron (4-8mg) if needed. Identify and avoid triggers.

conditions.name: Gastroenteritis
conditions.suggestion: Stay hydrated with clear fluids, follow BRAT diet. Common tablets: Loperamide (2mg) for diarrhea, Ondansetron (4mg) for nausea, ORS tablets for rehydration. Avoid dairy and fatty foods. Seek medical attention if severe dehydration occurs.

conditions.name: Bronchitis
conditions.suggestion: Rest, use humidifier. Common tablets: Guaifenesin (400mg) for mucus, Dextromethorphan (15-30mg) for cough, Acetaminophen (500mg) for fever. Avoid smoking and irritants. Stay hydrated.

conditions.name: Hypertension
conditions.suggestion: Monitor blood pressure regularly, take prescribed medications. Common tablets: Diuretics like Hydrochlorothiazide (25mg), Beta blockers like Metoprolol (50mg), ACE inhibitors like Lisinopril (5mg). Reduce salt intake, exercise regularly, manage stress.

conditions.name: Type 2 Diabetes
conditions.suggestion: Monitor blood sugar regularly, take prescribed medications. Common tablets: Metformin (500mg) for blood sugar control, Sulfonylureas like Glipizide (5mg) for insulin release. Follow diabetic diet, exercise regularly, check feet daily.

conditions.name: Asthma
conditions.suggestion: Use prescribed inhalers. Common tablets: Corticosteroids like Prednisone (5mg) for inflammation, Bronchodilators like Albuterol (2mg) for airway opening. Avoid triggers, follow asthma action plan, seek emergency care for severe attacks.

conditions.name: Allergic Rhinitis
conditions.suggestion: Avoid allergens, use antihistamines. Common tablets: Loratadine (10mg) for allergy relief, Nasal sprays like Oxymetazoline (0.05%) for congestion. Keep windows closed during high pollen counts.

conditions.name: Acid Reflux (GERD)
conditions.suggestion: Avoid trigger foods, eat smaller meals, don't lie down after eating. Common tablets: Antacids like Tums (500mg) for quick relief, Histamine-2 (H2) blockers like Ranitidine (150mg) for acid reduction, Proton pump inhibitors like Omeprazole (20mg) for long-term relief. Elevate head while sleeping.

conditions.name: Urinary Tract Infection
conditions.suggestion: Common tablets: Nitrofurantoin (100mg) or Trimethoprim/Sulfamethoxazole as prescribed antibiotics, Phenazopyridine (200mg) for urinary pain relief. Drink plenty of water, urinate frequently.

conditions.name: Osteoarthritis
conditions.suggestion: Exercise regularly, maintain healthy weight. Common tablets: Acetaminophen (500mg) for pain relief, NSAIDs like Ibuprofen (400mg) for inflammation, Glucosamine and Chondroitin supplements for joint health. Use assistive devices, apply heat/cold therapy.

conditions.name: Depression
conditions.suggestion: Seek professional help, take prescribed medications. Common tablets: Selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs) like Fluoxetine (20mg), Serotonin-norepinephrine reuptake inhibitors (SNRIs) like Venlafaxine (37.5mg). Engage in therapy, maintain social connections, exercise regularly.

conditions.name: Anxiety Disorder
conditions.suggestion: Practice relaxation techniques, seek therapy. Common tablets: Benzodiazepines like Alprazolam (0.25mg) for short-term relief, SSRIs like Sertraline (25mg) for long-term relief. Maintain regular exercise and sleep schedule.
